column5: We have done well on the Walleye and Pike but only catch the sporadic Perch. Has anyone had any luck fishing for Perch in this area and care to throw some advice my way so I can win the annual fishing contest this year? Thanks, FTFS
Its always sporadic, years of fishing the system its just an odd perch here or there.
Caught some in Back Bay, but have not targeted them up there. Too busy chasing walleye, smallmouths and huge Pike.
